about.title: I AM
about.description1: Creative Designer and Early-Stage Developer with extensive hands-on experience in visual design, branding, and application development. <sabraman>Sabraman</sabraman> - Danya Yudin (Даня Юдин) specializes in creating innovative digital solutions.
about.description2: I have a proven track record of transforming concepts into visually appealing and functional digital products. My passion lies in integrating design and technology to deliver intuitive user experiences. Known as <karton>Karton</karton> in creative circles, I bring unique perspectives to every project.

vaparshop.title: VAPARSHOP
vaparshop.subtitle: Designer & Junior Developer
vaparshop.description: Leading design and development initiatives for a growing vape retail company in Saint Petersburg.
vaparshop.challengeText: VAPARSHOP needed to modernize their operations and improve efficiency across multiple business processes while maintaining their unique brand identity.
vaparshop.solutionText: I developed a comprehensive suite of digital solutions including Telegram bots, web applications, and branding materials that significantly improved operational efficiency.

achievements.0: Developed Telegram bots that improved internal operational efficiency by 40%
achievements.1: Created a custom Price Tag Generator web application
achievements.2: Designed branded Telegram Emoji Pack for enhanced brand recognition
achievements.3: Redesigned corporate presentations with unique visual identity
achievements.4: Built a comprehensive Taplink alternative using Next.js
achievements.5: Currently developing Telegram Mini App with GetMeBack API integration

hornyPlace.title: HORNY PLACE
hornyPlace.subtitle: Visual Designer & Developer
hornyPlace.description: Comprehensive visual design and development for an innovative vape retail brand.
hornyPlace.challengeText: Horny Place needed a complete visual identity overhaul and digital presence that would stand out in a competitive market.
hornyPlace.solutionText: I created a comprehensive brand identity system and developed various digital solutions including signage, promotional materials, and web applications.

achievements.0: Created various exterior signage designs for retail locations

sections.brandChallenge: The challenge was to create a brand that felt contemporary and edgy, yet accessible and cohesive across multiple touchpoints - from physical retail environments to digital platforms.
